ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I just downloaded the Heritrix 3.0 and tried to launch it through SSH by bin/heritrix -p 8081 -x -a PASSWORD, however, I got errors: Fri Jan 29 23:53:47

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi,

I just downloaded the Heritrix 3.0 and tried to launch it through SSH by
bin/heritrix -p 8081 -x -a PASSWORD, however, I got errors:

Fri Jan 29 23:53:47 MST 2010 Starting heritrix
> ERROR: JVM terminated without running Heritrix.
> This could be due to invalid JAVA_OPTS or JMX_PORT, etc.
> See heritrix_out.log for more details.
> Here are its last three lines:
>
>                                  password, and key password for HTTPS use.
> Separate with commas, no
>                                  whitespace.
>

I wonder what's wrong. and what's the keystore path?  I am trying to read
the online manual
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Running+Heritrix+3.0

Thanks!

Tony

-- 
- Are you *RCholic*? www.RCholic.com

--00504502de069c0066047e5c3fc8
